name: Gravity Commander
description:
Control Local Gravity to collect various objects across multiple levels and scenarios. 

Features:

  • Detailed Options Screen
  • Customize Control Location & Size.
  • Multiple Level Types: No Time Limit, Timed, Obstacle Avoidance.
  • Play Locked Level Progression or Freely Select Level.
  • Increase / Decrease challenge for Timed Levels
  • Supports multiple Screen Sizes.

Note: Game is supported by advertisements. In the options screen, it is possible to choose between Banner Ads or Ads Between Levels (but minimum 90 seconds apart)
